mapper.sql: uid, username, usertype, name, password, userinfo_id, usercredit_id, userasset_id, reg_time
mapper.insert:
insert into user
uid,
username,
usertype,
name,
password,
reg_time,
userinfo_id,
usercredit_id,
userasset_id,

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
userinfo_id = #{userinfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usercredit_id = #{usercreditId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userasset_id = #{userassetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userinfo_id = #{userinfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usercredit_id = #{usercreditId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userasset_id = #{userassetId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uid,username,usertype,name,password,userinfo_id from user where username=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and password=#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and usertype=#{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}
